title: First Post
content: Nothing better than books and the beach! Going to be a great weekend reading this - I've heard it's highly rated.

title: Second Post
content: Have you guys heard about something called LOTR? I guess it's supposed to be pretty good. Lots of books and pages to read...wish me luck!

title: Third Post
content: Not gonna lie..this book wasn't very good. Don't waste your time - thank u, next.

title: Fourth Post
content: Currently reading Frankenstein and couldn't be more obsessed! If you're looking for a good scifi, would highly recommend! Specifically the 1818 publication by Mary Shelley.

title: Fifth Post
content: A snow day calls for cozying up on the couch with a good book in hand. These are some of my next few reads - high expectations!
